title: Emerson MWRG0901W Retro Compact Countertop 800W Microwave Oven with 1,000W Grill Function, LED Display 5 Power Levels, 8 Auto Menus, Glass Turntable and Child Safe Lock, 0.9 Cu. Ft, White
description: With a retro design that adds flair to any kitchen, the Emerson 0.9 cu. ft. 800W Microwave Oven with Grill is more than just a stylish appliance. It's your new go-to for quick and easy cooking. This microwave doesn't just look the part - it performs beautifully too. The multi-stage cooking ability allows you to combine the microwave and grill to lock in flavor and texture. Eight auto cook programs take the guesswork out of cooking popcorn, pizza, frozen foods and more. With features like a kitchen timer, child safety lock, and removable turntable, the Emerson Retro Microwave has everything busy families need to cook meals with convenience. Its retro styling gives it broad appeal in farmhouse, industrial, vintage or contemporary kitchens. Bring personality and power to your countertop with the Emerson Retro Microwave Oven.
